name: Hot Italian Sausage
description: Homemade hot Italian fennel sausage isn't a chore. Lightly browned and crumbled, this pork sausage makes a terrific topping for pizza or an addition to a rustic pasta dish.
keywords: fennel seeds, pork shoulder, healthy, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound coarsely ground pork shoulder, not too lean
1/2 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the pork in a bowl and add all remaining ingredients. Mix well to distribute the seasoning evenly throughout the meat.
Cover and refrigerate for up to 3 days, or freeze for future use.
